result.name: SNPitty: An intuitive web-application for interactive B-allele frequency and copy-number visualization of next generation sequencing data.
result.description: Development of the web-application SNPitty that allows interactive visualization and interrogation of Variant Call Format (VCF) files by utilizing B-allele frequencies (BAF) of single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs), coverage metrics and copy-numbers.
result.center: Cancer Computational Biology Center (CCBC) at Erasmus MC
result.platform: Ion Personal Genome Machine (PGM) System v2, Illumina HiSeq 2000, Ion S5XL
